system.description:
The Combat Harness is worn by the operator of an M56 Smartgun. Made from composite micromesh ballistic armor, the articulation arm attached to the Smartgun is connected to a mount via the harness. The harness is heavily padded to ease chafing at the shoulders and hips.The combat harness also has a mount for a tactical flashlight, that can be turned off or on through any interface software.

Special Notes

When wearing this armor while using a M56 Smartgun, the weight of the M56 Smartgun is reduced by 95%, and the M56 Smartgun recieves a +8 Recoil Reduction on all attacks. This armor protects the legs of the wearer, providing DR and Defense to all listed areas
